messages.subject: Gratitude and a thank you
messages.msgSnippet: Happy New Year! I ve been enjoying an email experiment about gratitude, follow the  link below to get 42 emails, sent daily.  I know this had made it to some
messages.messageBody:
Happy New Year!

I've been enjoying an email experiment about gratitude, follow the link
below to get 42 emails, sent daily. I know this had made it to some of the other
lists, but I haven't seen it here.


_www.GoGratitude.com/masterkey_ (http://www.GoGratitude.com/masterkey)



While I've got your attention, thank you to all the owners and moderators
for such a great list. Thank you to everyone that thoughtfully posts about
their joyful lives. And thank you for the new people that so bravely tell us
about their own lives, so the rest of us can learn along with you.

I love unschooling...and unschoolers! :)

~Leslie in SC




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
